hudson.tasks.Shell.command: SLURM_VERSION="2.5.6" export CREATEREPOOPTS= export MOCKDISTPREFIX= export REPODIR=/var/lib/jenkins/"$DIST"/ export MOCK="/usr/bin/mock" export MOCKDIR="/var/lib/mock" if [ "$DIST" = "epel-5-x86_64" ]; then export CREATEREPOOPTS='-s sha'; fi if [ -f /etc/pacifica/jenkins.sh ]; then . /etc/pacifica/jenkins.sh; fi wget -O slurm-$SLURM_VERSION.tar.bz2 http://www.schedmd.com/download/latest/slurm-$SLURM_VERSION.tar.bz2 tar -xjf slurm-$SLURM_VERSION.tar.bz2 slurm-$SLURM_VERSION/slurm.spec rm -f *.src.rpm rm -rf packages mkdir -p packages/"$DIST"/bin $MOCK -r "$MOCKDISTPREFIX$DIST" --buildsrpm --spec=`pwd`/slurm-$SLURM_VERSION/slurm.spec --sources=$PWD cp $MOCKDIR/"$MOCKDISTPREFIX$DIST"/result/*.src.rpm . if ! $MOCK -r "$MOCKDISTPREFIX$DIST" --result `pwd`/packages/"$DIST"/bin slurm-$SLURM_VERSION*.src.rpm; then more $MOCKDIR/"$MOCKDISTPREFIX$DIST"/result/*log | cat exit -1 fi cp -a packages/"$DIST"/bin/* "$REPODIR" createrepo $CREATEREPOOPTS "$REPODIR"
